      • addRedirectionTo

        public void addRedirectionTo​(String targetIP,
                             int targetPort,
                             float taskThreshold,
                             Term mustContainTerm,
                             boolean sendInput)
                      throws SocketException,
                             UnknownHostException
        Add another target Nar node to redirect tasks to, and under which conditions.
        Parameters:
        targetIP - The target Nar node IP
        targetPort - The target Nar node port
        taskThreshold - The threshold the priority of the task has to have to redirect
        mustContainTerm - The optional term that needs to be contained recursively in the task term
        Throws:
        SocketException
        UnknownHostException
